title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication System
summary: Implement a secure and compliant login process with multi-factor authentication.
description: Develop a secure authentication module that requires multiple verification factors such as password, OTP, or biometric validation. This system should ensure user credentials and sessions are fully encrypted, prevent unauthorized access, and adhere to financial data security and privacy regulations. The authentication process should be flexible yet user-friendly, reducing login friction while maintaining robust protection.

title: Responsive User Interface and Personalized Dashboard
summary: Design and deliver a modern, responsive dashboard personalized to each user.
description: Build an intuitive interface compatible with various devices, ensuring a consistent user experience across desktops, tablets, and mobile phones. The personalized dashboard should display relevant banking products, account details, and available services based on user profiles and eligibility. Incorporate accessibility standards and intuitive navigation for an easy and engaging experience.

title: Integration with Core Banking and Portal Database
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s core systems and dedicated database.
description: Establish a robust, secure integration layer that connects the self-service portal with the bank’s existing core banking infrastructure. Create a standalone database to support portal operations, ensuring performance optimization and data synchronization integrity. The integration must support bidirectional updates for transactions, product data, and service requests using secure APIs and message queues.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable streamlined workflows for account opening and service modification requests.
description: Develop guided, low-click workflows for users to digitally initiate account opening or request service modifications. Ensure validation, data prepopulation where possible, and integration with backend systems for automated processing. Include functionality to save applications in progress, allowing users to resume later. The workflow design should minimize friction and improve overall efficiency.

title: Document Upload and Verification Module
summary: Provide secure document upload and verification for user workflows.
description: Implement the capability for customers to upload necessary documents directly through the portal as part of application or service modification processes. Files should be securely transmitted and stored, scanned for malware, and linked to the respective workflows. Include document validation, versioning, and encryption mechanisms to comply with financial data protection requirements.

title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications
summary: Deliver real-time request status updates and automated notifications.
description: Develop real-time tracking functionality enabling customers to view the current status of all submitted applications or service requests. Integrate with backend systems to push updates instantly. Implement configurable email and push notifications to alert users at each workflow stage, ensuring timely communication and transparency.

title: User Interaction History and Audit Logging
summary: Maintain a record of customer interactions and actions for transparency.
description: Create a comprehensive history module that captures and displays all user actions, transactions, and requests made through the portal. Provide an intuitive interface for viewing history, along with advanced search and filtering capabilities. Implement secure logging mechanisms to maintain system auditability and compliance with internal and regulatory standards.

title: Role-Based Access Control and Permissions Management
summary: Develop access control and permissions based on user roles and profiles.
description: Implement a role-based access control framework ensuring users can only view and act upon services and data authorized to their profile. Define and manage user roles, assign permissions dynamically, and enforce segregation of access between customers, staff, and administrators. Integrate centralized management for easier maintenance and audit readiness.

title: Data Security and Regulatory Compliance Framework
summary: Ensure full compliance with financial data protection regulations.
description: Establish a security framework encompassing encryption for data at rest and in transit, secure backups, and detailed audit trails. Ensure the system adheres to applicable banking sector regulations regarding data privacy, customer consent, and cybersecurity. Include ongoing monitoring, penetration testing, and incident management policies to maintain platform integrity.
